inclusion.criterion: Female patients at least 21 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with invasive ductal carcinoma staged T1 or T2 with estrogen receptor and progesterone receptor positive (ER+/PR+) who are scheduled for sentinel lymph node biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with Ductal Carcinoma In Situ (DCIS) (high or low grade) who are scheduled for sentinel lymph node biopsy including: Patients having a mastectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing breast conservation with large (>5cm) area of DCIS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with signed consent to participate
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous axillary dissection or previous lymph node biopsy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
